titles.title: We Are One In The Spirit

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(Brothers) In Your love we are brothers, Praise the Lord, praise the Lord. (Sisters) In Your love we are sisters, Praise the Lord, praise the Lord. (All) And we praise You that our family Has now been restored.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now the Lord is the Spirit And the Spirit is the Lord. Now the Lord is the Spirit And the Spirit is the Lord. And in the Spirit we are All of one accord.{/lang-eng}
